title: An Honest Broker: Remembering Brent Scowcroft – Association for Diplomatic Studies & Training

quotes: William Primosch: Washington, D.C.—National Security Council; Economic Division (1992–1993)
William Primosch was interviewed by Charles Stuart Kennedy on May 2, 2001
Brent Scowcroft at a Congressional Briefing  (1991) (Paul Hosefros) | The New

organizations.name: National Security Council
quotes: Within the staff that Brent inherited, I think he made it reasonably clear that he intended to have all new senior directors. These would be his guys, his picks.
William Primosch: Washington, D.C.—National Security Council; Economic Division (1992–1993)

organizations.name: NSC
quotes: Brent’s picks for the senior director roles in the NSC staff started to dribble out into the press . . .
There is a big difference between an organization like the NSC and the State Department.

organizations.name: State Department
quotes: There is a big difference between an organization like the NSC and the State Department.

organizations.name: Bush White House
quotes: The way the system was set up in the Bush White House, you had pretty direct access to the National Security Adviser.

Within the staff that Brent inherited, I think he made it reasonably clear that he intended to have all new senior directors. These would be his guys, his picks.

roles.title: senior director for Europe and Soviet Affairs
quotes: Bob Blackwill as the senior director for Europe and Soviet Affairs, Richard Haass as the senior director for Near Eastern Affairs, David Miller as the senior director for Africa Affairs and also for what you might call drugs and thugs, counter-terrorism and counter-narcotics.
